p: We received your dear, dear letter! You are becoming quite an efficient little typist, Joanie & Auntie is proud of you! So is Unka Oddie & Auntie Alice & Auntie Hilda. You must have a good teacher, haven't you?
Joanie, later on, Auntie is going to make you something cute to wear - perhaps for your birthday, if not sooner. Is that all right?
Elaine, we hope you'll love your littler rooster, etc.
